result.eng: Did you enjoy the night?

result.ponchtml: Ar ḃain tú taitneaṁ as an oíċeDid you enjoy the night?

result.eng: He would usually go out on Friday night.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.orig: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.html: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche AoineHe would usually go out on Friday night.

result.eng: I enjoyed the night very much.
result.ga: Bhian mé an-sult as an oíche
result.orig: Bhian mé an-sult as an oíche
result.html: Bhian mé an-sult as an oícheI enjoyed the night very much.
result.ponchtml: Ḃian mé an-sult as an oíċeI enjoyed the night very much.

result.eng: I usually work late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag obair déanach san oícheI usually work late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair déanaċ san oíċeI usually work late at night.

result.eng: I spent the night in the pub.
result.ga: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairne
result.html: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairneI spent the night in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé an oíċe sa teaċ táḃairneI spent the night in the pub.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche

result.eng: I went to bed late at night.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.orig: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.html: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oícheI went to bed late at night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé a luí déanaċ san oíċeI went to bed late at night.

result.eng: That event put and end to the night.
result.ga: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche
result.orig: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.orig: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh

result.eng: The door must be locked every night.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.eng: We will be in An Béal Bocht tomorrow night in the Bronx.

result.eng: Put this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.

result.eng: It's midnight. Good night to y'all.
